attributes.action: ban the Yellow Pages, Zargon Adverts from all television stations and never to be seen again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For many months Yellow Pages has been forcfully subjecting the Uk Media viewing public to the most ridiculous and annoying advertising campaign starring 'Zargon' the destroyer of audience demographics. I with the backing of the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister to force Yellow Pages to ban this advert from the UKs television screens for all time.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
